name: Community and Site Search unavailable
content: We need to migrate Community and Site Search to new machines and services might be unavailable for up to 3 hours Friday 27th December 2019 from 10AM CET.

updates.content: We have taken down Community and Site search to snapshot and move the services.

Site search has been migrated successfully. Scraping and search functionality should be working as normal. Scraping that were launched during the migration has been marked as failed and might need redoing.

Community migration is still in progress.
